about_the_game:
The Genesis of The Delegati universe, dive deep into this Future Fantasy, side-scrolling dungeon crawler to uncover the real reason you've been sent.

In a genre defining game, Delegati Genesis combines the genres Cyberpunk and Fantasy into a new Future Fantasy genre. Yes, there will be dragons, but empowered with Flux, the energy to power both spells and machines. Your personalized character will have to choose which talent tree to pursue, defeat enemies to gain levels and loot, and fight against oneself in challenging jumping puzzles.

With a focus on stunning visuals, the side-scrolling nature of Delegati Genesis will enable the player to take time to enjoy the background art, mood, and overall experience after a challenging battle.

Key Features:
Dungeon Crawler
Side-Scrolling
RPG classes like Warrior, Mage, and Engineer
Talent Tree
Gain levels
Collect loot and gear
Colorful, Futuristic, and Fantasy Themes
Single-Player
Unique Storytelling

name: Delegati Genesis

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
